text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires stating that the TDM exception is unlikely to offer a defense because of the commercial nature of Synthetic Dreams. The candidate answer explicitly addresses this under section 2.A, stating: 'The UK has a limited exception for TDM (s.29A CDPA 1988), but it only applies to non-commercial research or private study.
